attributes.action: Introduce Covid-19 tax on the financial sector.Banks should bail out the people.
attributes.additional_details: For the same reasons we bailed out the banks in 2008.
attributes.background: Review how the financial sector can help with Covid-19 outbreak. These measures should be appropriate and reflect the temporary nature. This could be a voluntary one-off payments for an amount to be specified by government or an emergency tax. Must not be passed to consumers for at least 5 years.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like to be taxed and how. 
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
